requirements.summary: Trigger a fresh frontend build/preview refresh without changing application functionality or backend behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: A new build is produced successfully with no code changes required.
The Preview action/link in the interface points to the newly generated preview build.
No backend state migrations are performed as part of this regeneration.

file_operations.description: Add/clarify documentation for how to regenerate a fresh preview build and what to verify (e.g., rebuild/redeploy steps and confirming the Preview link updates), without changing app code or behavior.
